website_summaries.verdict: The Yourflex Trainette 11 is a budget-friendly trainer from Reebok that doesn’t fall short of quality. It has been described as reliable training and casual footwear which also feels light on the foot. Just be ready to remove or replace the insole as it can potentially cause discomfort.
pros: Users agree across the board that Yourflex Trainette 11 is a decent all-around shoe for workouts and walking
Most buyers laud the price-quality ratio of this trainer
Its clean design has also been favored by many purchasers
The shoe is generally described as comfortable
More than a few wearers consider it a lightweight piece of footwear
cons: The shoe’s insole has been lambasted by most wearers
It was undersized and felt hard
A few people wish for more ankle support
They say it is hard to get a tight fit even when the laces a fully cinched

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite pair!!
customer_reviews.text: This may be the most comfortable shoes I’ve ever owned! I have had multiple foot surgeries and these shoes feel so good on! It is so difficult for me to find a pair that does hurt the plates inside my foot. These sneakers are da bomb dot com!! Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fit as expected. It doesn't have as much "cushion" as I am use to, but it still works well. I bought these for pickleball and they are working out well. My other court shoes were giving me blisters, but these do not.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for $40
customer_reviews.text: Good fit. The inserts are this really awful plastic/rubber material through and through. I’m going to toss them and buy cloth topped ones at the store. The lace holes on the inside are not high enough so the shoe bows out there and it looks a little weird. I’m hoping it won’t be so bad after they break in. I got them mostly for work and I expect they’ll be comfortable enough for that. I destroy a pair annually so I didn’t want to get anything expensive
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and durability
customer_reviews.text: This is my fifth pair of Yourflex Trainers. I have MS and difficulty walking. These are the only shoes( soles) on a sneaker that I am amble to walk safely in.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and helps with back pain
customer_reviews.text: I have back and neck pain, which get way worse if I stand up or walk around for too long. These shoes provide great support and helped reduce the severity of my back and neck pain! They fit as expected and are very cute, too!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase, get them!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful shoe, well-made, attractive, and very comfortable. True to fit, lightweight, I love them!
customer_reviews.author: LindyLouWho

customer_reviews.title: Don't Reccomend.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe was very stiff and took a long time to get worn in. They hurt my feet from the stiffness while working out. I had the previous model of this shoe and they were totally different and fit completely different. This shoe was too big, less support, and not a good quality workout shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Jason morris

customer_reviews.title: great but insole should be wider
customer_reviews.text: comfortable i did return them, the insole had a hard edge that was bothering me. Otherwise i wanted to keep them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Odd shape
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is too small and narrow. Odd shape to toe that made uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: zzz

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: The back tab is a little high so it rubs on your heal and a little uncomfortable. Overall it’s a good supportive shoe and can wear them all day on my feet. Once they wear in I think they will be better.
customer_reviews.author: Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have a union so I need a flexible shoe. I found this shoe so comfortable/reasonably priced that I bought 2 pair-
customer_reviews.author: Anna P.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoes & great quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes!!!! The fit, the lightness, style & color..... I am very happy with these. I have been buying Reebok for years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Have had these for over a year. True to fit, very comfortable, really enjoy walking or working out in them. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Anotherone

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: Runs small I think. I've had a pair of Reebok Yourflex for years and they're my favorite sneaker. I had them in a size 9.5. I'm usually a size 9. These were either size 9 or 10 - no half size so I bought the 9. Way too snug. I got them in a size 10 and they feel a little roomy but more comfortable. I'd suggest going up if between sizes or even a whole size. Nice that they were free returns and shipping was quick.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Cross Trainer
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these shoes. I typically wear a 10.5 so was worried the 11 would be too big, but it's fine. They are comfortable, yet supportive for lifting.
customer_reviews.author: Just Left of Middle

customer_reviews.title: Cool shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight! I have received lots of compliments! Wish they had a more comfortable sole.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Morris

product_meta.title: Reebok womens Yourflex Trainette 11 Mt
product_meta.description: Deliver the workout results you are looking for with the help of the Reebok® Yourflex Trainette 11 MT sneaker. Synthetic mesh upper for comfort, fit, and breathability. Traditional lace-up closure. Padded tongue and collar. Closed round toe. Textile lining and MemoryTech™ sockliner for increased cushioning. IMEVA midsole for cushioning and responsiveness. Carbon rubber heel strike lends durable traction. YourFlex™ technology combines an all-over lightweight construction with RealFlex-inspired outsole nodes to promote natural motion. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 7 oz Product measurements were taken using size 7.5, width B - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: Deliver the workout results you are looking for with the help of the Reebok® Yourflex Trainette 11 MT sneaker.
Synthetic mesh upper for comfort, fit, and breathability.

Closed round toe. Textile lining and MemoryTech™ sockliner for increased cushioning. IMEVA midsole for cushioning and responsiveness. Carbon rubber heel strike lends durable traction. YourFlex™ technology combines an all-over lightweight construction with RealFlex-inspired outsole nodes to promote natural motion. Imported.
